typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SCD1Src
SCD1Src alterRow(upsertIf(1==1)) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		ID as integer,
		Name as string,
		Model as string,
		Length as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: 'adfdemoc',
	rejectedData_folderPath: 'EventtriggerOutput',
	transactionCommit: 'single',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sink1
